title: Email App with chatbot
description: A modern communication platform combining Gmail-style email management with an AI-powered chatbot, built with Next.js and designed with micro-frontend principles.

title: Retail Selling Price (RSP) of Petrol and Diesel across Indian metro cities
description: A production-ready React + TypeScript dashboard for analyzing the Retail Selling Price (RSP) of Petrol and Diesel across Indian metro cities.

title: Company-Directory--React-App
description: A React-based frontend application that displays brewery data from the Open Brewery DB API with advanced filtering, sorting, and pagination features.

title: Real Time Task Board
description: Developed a real-time task board with React,Zustand, Socket, and react-beautiful-dnd  and drag-and-drop support across multiple users

title: Food Villa
description: Developed a Swiggy-inspired React app that fetches real-time data for 100+ restaurants and 500+ menu items. Implemented dynamic routing, live search, and responsive UI with 20+ reusable components

title: React Work
description: This is a project made to learn the latest languages by building an app.

title: Portfolio Project
description: This project is about my detailed profile and skills and projects done by me.

title: Music Genres Classification
description: Recurrent Neural Network(LSTM) model to classify a given audio sample into one of the 10 different music genres. Analysed and compared the performance of LSTM models with different parameters.
